mapper.select: SELECT id, mst_id, room_name, num_of_guests, check_in_time, check_out_time, weekday_price, weekend_price, pic1_org, pic1_uuid, pic2_org, pic2_uuid, pic3_org, pic3_uuid FROM room_dtl
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_room_dtl.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO room_dtl ( id, mst_id, room_name, num_of_guests, check_in_time, check_out_time, weekday_price, weekend_price, pic1_org, pic1_uuid, pic2_org, pic2_uuid, pic3_org, pic3_uuid, c_user, type_of_room ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{mstId}, #{roomName}, #{numOfGuests}, #{checkInTime},#{checkOutTime}, #{weekdayPrice}, #{weekendPrice}, #{pic1Org}, #{pic1Uuid}, #{pic2Org}, #{pic2Uuid}, #{pic3Org}, #{pic3Uuid}, #{cUser}, #{typeOfRoom} )
mapper.update: UPDATE room_dtl SET room_name = #{roomName}, num_of_guests = #{numOfGuests}, check_in_time = #{checkInTime}, check_out_time = #{checkOutTime}, weekday_price = #{weekdayPrice}, weekend_price = #{weekendPrice}, pic1_org = #{pic1Org}, pic1_uuid = #{pic1Uuid}, pic2_org = #{pic2Org}, pic2_uuid = #{pic2Uuid}, pic3_org = #{pic3Org}, pic3_uuid = #{pic3Uuid}, c_user = #{cUser}, type_of_room = #{typeOfRoom} WHERE mst_id = #{mstId} AND id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE room_dtl WHERE id = #{id} AND mst_id = #{mstId}
